title: A corrosion-free zinc metal battery with an ultra-thin zinc anode and high depth of discharge
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04320G, Paper
Rui Yao, Yunxiang Zhao, Lumeng Wang, Chengxiang Xiao, Feiyu Kang, Chunyi Zhi, Cheng Yang
Benefiting from the weakly coordinated solvation structures and the exclusion of H+, a corrosion-free zinc metal battery with an ultra-thin zinc anode and high depth of discharge was achieved.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
